title: Stadia Changelog: Risk of Rain 2 update and a no-show at I/O
content:
As focus has seemed to lessen on Stadia over the past couple of years, Stadia was an unsurprising no-show at this year’s Google I/O conference, and it also came as no new games were released this week.

more…

The post Stadia Changelog: Risk of Rain 2 update and a no-show at I/O appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Unsurprisingly, Stadia was a no-show at Google I/O 2022, and the only new development on the service was a Risk of Rain update.
